mapper.update: update day_report set title=#{title}, report_sale=#{report_sale},content=#{content},achive_rank=#{achive_rank}, approval=#{approval},opinion=#{opinion} where report_no=#{report_no} and date=#{date} and id=#{id};
mapper.select: select report_no,title,report_sale,b.content as content,achive_rank,approval,opinion,b.date,reg_date,day_sale as goal_sale from day_report as a,day_plan as b where a.date=b.date and a.id=b.id and a.id=#{id};

select report_no,title,report_sale,b.content as content,achive_rank,approval,opinion,b.date,reg_date,day_sale as goal_sale from day_report as a,day_plan as b where a.date=b.date and a.id=b.id and a.date=#{date} and a.id=#{id};
select report_no,title, report_sale,content,achive_rank,approval,opinion,reg_date,date from day_report as a, user as b where a.id=b.id and b.dept=#{dept};
mapper.delete: delete from day_report where report_no=#{report_no} and id=#{id} and approval=0;
mapper.select: select report_no from day_report where id=#{id} and date=#{date} and approval=#{approval};

choose.when: update day_report set end_gauge=#{end_gauge} where id=#{id} and date=#{date};
choose.otherwise: update day_report set start_gauge=#{start_gauge} where id=#{id} and date=#{date};

mapper.select: select report_no,title, report_sale,content,achive_rank,approval,opinion,reg_date,date from day_report where id=#{id} and DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 day) order by date,report_no desc;
select report_no,title, report_sale,content,achive_rank,approval,opinion,reg_date,date from day_report where id=#{id} and date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} order by date desc;
select report_no,title, report_sale,content,achive_rank,approval,opinion,reg_date,date from day_report where report_no=#{report_no};
mapper.update: update day_report set approval=#{approval} where report_no=#{report_no};
mapper.select: select report_sale as week_sale,achive_rank from day_report where date=#{date} and id=#{id};
select * from day_report as a, user as b where a.id=b.id and b.dept=(select dept from user where id=#{id}) and date=#{date};
